sentences.en: 'I cannot keep her head for the stockade, sir,'said I to the captain.
sentences.cn: “ 我没法将船头对准木寨, 先生.”我对船长说.

sentences.en: At length I thought I might return towards the stockade.
sentences.cn: 我终于觉得可以折回来向木寨方向走去了.

sentences.en: Guys like you end up in the stockade sooner or later.
sentences.cn: 像你这样的人早晚会被关起来的.

sentences.en: He reversed into the stockade in a cloud of dust.
sentences.cn: 他在一阵尘土中将车倒进了围栏。

sentences.en: I had not gone a hundred yards when I reached the stockade.
sentences.cn: 我跑了不到一百码,就到了木寨前.

sentences.en: More pirates were starting to climb into the stockade.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的海盗开始爬进寨子.

sentences.en: She would spend a full thirty days in the county stockade.
sentences.cn: 她将在县拘留所里呆上整整三十天.

sentences.en: Stokade: Unemployed captives are housed in the stockade.
sentences.cn: 俘虏拘留营: 没活干的俘虏们就留在这里.

sentences.en: Surveyors lay out Wall Street along the line of the stockade.
sentences.cn: 测量员沿着栅栏设计出墙街.

sentences.en: The doctor was now inside the stockade.'Not Jim?
sentences.cn: 大夫已经进了寨子. “ 难道是吉姆 吗 ?”

sentences.en: The lambs were kept in the stockade.
sentences.cn: 小羊羔被放在围栏里养着.

sentences.en: The sheep were surrounded by stockade.
There is no barbed wire . No stockade watchtower.
sentences.cn: 这女入有铁丝网, 入有栅栏,也入有了视台.

sentences.en: They're inside the stockade that Flint made years ago.
sentences.cn: 他们正在弗林特几年前建的寨子里.

sentences.en: Well armed, they stole out of the stockade; but it proved a useless mission.
sentences.cn: 他们带好武器, 悄悄翻过栅栏, 结果白跑了一趟.

trans.tran_en: a fence built from long thick pieces of wood pushed into the ground, used to defend a place
